name: Viva Hexagon! Feat. Ipulo
summary: Viva Hexagon! is a tile-matching versus puzzle game, where you have to match hexagonal cells by controlling a small playable platforming character on the board to pick up and move pieces. Featured game modes include versus mode, which can be played against a friend or an A.I. opponent, solo mode, which can be played by yourself, and battle mode, which can be played against a friend or an A.I. opponent. There is also a custom game option, which gives you a myriad of options to customize for all 3 game modes, as well as alternate rules such as changing what happens to the opponent when you score matches.
